extendedInfo.description: This is a calculator for all you pixel art fans.  It is a simple calculator with 8-Bit graphics and sound.We plan on adding many features including skins, different sounds, specific calculator types (tip calculator, shopping value calculator, etc), tablet support, and an ad free version.  Stay tuned.Please comment.  We would like to hear your comments and suggestions.

reviews.title: Yes!
reviews.comment: Skins/Themes! Love the sounds. I\'d pay for a version where I can assign my own sounds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice and Simple
reviews.comment: A nice calculator with pixel art. Just like advertised. I\'d like to see some skins.
reviews.author: A Google User
